p: Significant differences with regard to the bacterial community composition were expected among DCls according to their varying physico-chemical properties ( G贸mez-Brand贸n et al., 2017a). While pH, electrical conductivity and cellulose concentration decreased with increasing DCl, the moisture content as well as the concentrations of micro- and macronutrients such as N, Fe, and P increased ( G贸mez-Brand贸n et al., 2017a).
